channel.title: Nginx on ysyy's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Nginx on ysyy's blog

item.title: nginx
item.description: nginx安装 1. 安装依赖 yum install -y gcc gcc-c++ autoconf automake make yum install -y pcre pcre-devel yum install -y zlib zlib-devel yum install -y openssl openssl-devel 2. 转发后端图片 # 1. 创建目录 mkdir -p /data/nginx/cache # 2. 修改目录权限 chown -R nginx:nginx /data/nginx/cache nginx 命令 # 启动 nginx
